divs: Sighting DetailsIn August of 2005 at approximately noon during my scheduled shift as a loss prevention officer, I began routine observaton of the parking lot with my external PTZ CCTV Camera. It was a very clear day with high visibility and I often look around at the city and the surrounding mountians. I directed my camera towards a mountian near lake mead I noticed a shining object that I thought at the time was a vehicle on the side of it. I left the camera on the mountian and left my security office to get a drink when I returned I noticed the object had moved. At this time I began to observe the object and noticed it was sphere shaped and was moving very slow at times and speeding up at others. During my observation I went outside to check if I could see it from the parking lot and could not being at least 20 miles away in my estimation. I returned to the security office and continued to observe the craft it became obvious it was not a known craft had no external parts wings engines etc. During this time the craft actually dropped very close to the ground and I was able to zoom in on it. I watched the craft till the end of my shift at which time I took the whole tape home with me and I still have. During my observation I felt the craft was intelligently controlled and was either a experimental military craft or was in fact an extraterrestrial vehicle. I have seen predator drones and various jet fighters and helicopters around vegas being very close to several military bases and I can say it was somthing I have never seen. I also showed the tape to an ex airforce air traffic controller who was stationed at Nellis AFB for a couple years and he could not explain the craft.
